Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Jan 2019Short answer, yes.To break down the question better, a secured credit card is only issued when you deposit a minimum of $10K with the card-issuing bank. Why $10K? Because MAS says so, really!Other than UOB and HSBC, the following banks also issue secured credit cards1) POSB: https://www.posb.com.sg/personal/support/card-application-eligibility.html2) CIMB: https://www.cimbbank.com.sg/content/dam/cimbsingapore/personal/cards/forms/form-secured-card.pdf (This is a link to the application form though.)Also, another article you can refer to:https://theshutterwhale.com/blog/2017/1/7/how-to-get-a-credit-card-you-do-not-qualify-for-in-singapore-secured-credit-cardsHope all these helps!0 comments2
